metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1547 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists when the Windows BackupEngine improperly handles memory.To exploit this vulnerability, an attackerwould first have to gain execution on the victim system, aka 'WindowsBackup Engine Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is uniquefrom CVE-2020-1535, CVE-2020-1536, CVE-2020-1539, CVE-2020-1540,CVE-2020-1541, CVE-2020-1542, CVE-2020-1543, CVE-2020-1544, CVE-2020-1545,CVE-2020-1546, CVE-2020-1551.

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
